pages.text: 5|24|Tamen shuo:“Mu sa a! Tamen zai shengdi de qijian, women jue bu jinqu. Ni he ni de zhu qu zuozhan ba! Women biding yao zuo zai zheli.”
5|25|Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Chu wo ziji he wo di gege wai, wo buneng zuo zhu, wo qiu ni shi women he fanzui de minzhong fenkai.”
5|26|An la shuo:“Zai sishi niannei, tamen bude jinru shengdi, tamen yao piaobo zai kuangye; gu ni buyao aidao fanzui de minzhong.”

5|27|Ni dang rushi di dui tamen jiangshu a dan de liang ge er zi de gushi. Dangshi, ta lia ge xian yi jian gongwu, zhege de gongwu bei jieshoule, nage de gongwu wei bei jieshou. Nage shuo:“Wo bi sha ni.” Zhege shuo:“An la zhi jieshou jingwei zhe de gongwu.
5|28|Ruguo ni shenshou lai sha wo, wo jue bu shenshou qu sha ni; wo dique weiju an la——zhong shijie de zhu.
5|29|Wo biding yao ni danfu sha wo de zuize, he ni yuan you de zui'e, ni jiang chengwei huo yu de jumin. Zhe shi bu yi zhe de baochou.”
5|30|Ta de siyu cuanduo tasha ta de didi. Gu tashale ta zhihou, bian chengle kui she de ren.

5|31|An la shi yi zhi wuya lai jue di, yibian zhishi ta zenyang yanmai ta de didi de shiti. Ta shuo:“Shang zai! Wo zen buneng xiang zhe zhi wuya nayang, ba wo didi de shiti yanmai qilai ne?” Yushi ta bian cheng huihen de ren.
